AuthLayout.title: Welcome to SecureScribe
AuthLayout.description: A modern login experience powered by FPT Telecom and SecureScribe.
AuthLayout.subtitle: Smart AI meeting assistant
AuthLayout.tagline: Improve meeting efficiency | AI solution optimized for Vietnamese

HomePage.title: Hello, world!

hero.title: meeting management
hero.description: Optimize meetings with full tools for note-taking, analysis, and turning information into action

summaryCard.title: Meeting Summary
summaryCard.description: Summarize meetings using real-time or post-meeting AI

analyzeCard.title: Analysis & Insights
analyzeCard.description: Analyze number of meetings and activity statistics

features.title: Automatic Summarization
features.subtitle: Summarize meetings using real-time or post-meeting AI

features.title: Calendar Sync
features.subtitle: Sync with personal calendar, stay informed and reminded

features.title: Group Management
features.subtitle: Statistics and reports for groups beyond individuals

openSource.name: Free & Open Source
openSource.description: Our Next.js starter is fully open-source, allowing contributions, customization, and updates to the latest standards at no cost.

devStack.name: Modern Development Stack
devStack.summary: Smooth dev experience with Next.js, React, and TypeScript.
devStack.description: Designed for scalability, integrated with React Query for data fetching, Redux for state management, and Tailwind CSS for rapid UI building.

stateManagement.name: Optimized State Management
stateManagement.summary: Easily handle complex state with Redux and React Query.
stateManagement.description: This combo enables efficient data fetching, caching, and global state management for responsive and fast apps.

i18n.name: Multilingual Support (i18n)
i18n.description: Easily localize the app to improve user experience and attract diverse audiences with minimal config.

cicd.name: Robust CI/CD & Testing
cicd.summary: Focus on development, let GitHub Actions handle automation.
cicd.description: Includes unit, integration, and end-to-end testing for a solid platform.

devEnv.name: Developer-Friendly Environment
devEnv.summary: Enjoy a clean, maintainable codebase with ESLint, Prettier, and TypeScript.
devEnv.description: Optimized starter includes reusable UI components, hooks, and modular architecture for fast and scalable development.

stack.title: Work smarter with SecureScribe
stack.description: Speed up your development with a powerful, feature-rich Next.js starter built for performance, scalability, and developer productivity. Highlights include:

timeline.title: Upload Transcript
timeline.desc: Upload your meeting audio or transcript

timeline.title: AI Analysis
timeline.desc: System analyzes the content and extracts insights

timeline.title: Access Results
timeline.desc: View reports, summaries, and key points for action

benefits.title: Benefits
items: Extension works directly in the browser
Easily share results and notes with colleagues
Never miss any important meeting event
Built-in CMS for tracking and analyzing content

HomePage.installation: Easy project installation and setup guide.

testimonials.title: What users say about SecureScribe
testimonials.description: Hear from developers who've accelerated their projects using the Next.js Starter Kit.
benefits: Analyze sentiment and trends in content
Detect issues and opportunities from meeting data

items.name: Nguyễn Văn A
items.title: Frontend Developer
items.review: SecureScribe helped me launch projects much faster. The starter is easy to use and extend.

items.name: Trần Thị B
items.title: Fullstack Engineer
items.review: I highly value the i18n and Redux integration. Clean UI and codebase.

items.name: Lê Văn C
items.title: Tech Lead
items.review: This starter saved my team weeks of development. Great for large-scale projects.

items.name: Phạm Thị D
items.title: Product Manager
items.review: I love how SecureScribe helps manage meetings and analyze data. Very useful!

ForgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
ForgotPassword.description: Enter your registered email to reset your password.
ForgotPassword.successMessage: Password reset instructions have been sent to your email.
ForgotPassword.errorFailed: Failed to send reset instructions. Please try again.

AuthForm.sideDescription: Sign in to access Meobeo, your smart meeting note assistant.
AuthForm.subtitle: Please sign in to continue
AuthForm.emailNotVerified: Email not verified. We have sent a verification email, please check and verify your email before logging in.
AuthForm.userNotFound: No account found with this email.
AuthForm.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
AuthForm.tooManyRequests: Too many failed attempts. Please try again later.
AuthForm.accountExists: An account with this email already exists.
AuthForm.emailVerifiedRequired: Please verify your email before logging in.
AuthForm.invalidCredentials: Invalid login credentials. Please check your email and password.
AuthForm.networkErrorConnection: Network error. Please check your connection.
AuthForm.popupBlocked: Popup blocked by browser. Please allow popups and try again.
AuthForm.noAccountFound: No account found with this email.
AuthForm.tooManyRequestsGeneral: Too many requests. Please try again later.
AuthForm.invalidToken: Authentication token is invalid or expired.
AuthForm.tokenUsedTooEarly: Token used too early. Please check that your computer's clock is set correctly.
AuthForm.clockSyncError: Clock synchronization error. Please check your system time and try again.
